screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .voc file in RCA Digital Voice Manager
screenshot.caption: VOC file open in RCA Digital Voice Manager

description: Students, reporters, and others use RCA Digital Voice Recorders to record lectures, interviews, and meetings. Several models of RCA Digital Voice Recorder, including the RP5022B and RP5120, save recorded audio as VOC files.

You can transfer VOC files from a Digital Voice Recorder to your PC. To do so, connect your recorder to your PC via a USB port. Then, drag and drop the VOC files from your recorder to a location on your PC.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .voc file in RCA Digital Voice Manager
images.caption: VOC file open in RCA Digital Voice Manager
